text: @realDonaldTrump You’re worried about Wall Street & Profits when 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 are dying! May this be the end for you !! Epic failure to lead during a crisis!!  U want us to go back- ok right after YOU lick the subway handrails in NYC!! We want to breathe! #Covid19 https://t.co/muEaFI1gEt
